This file triggers CI/CD testing for T072.
Test timestamp: 2025-11-15

The workflow should:
1. Generate keymaps from config/keymap.yaml
2. Build QMK firmware for all configured boards
3. Publish artifacts

Expected boards to build:
- Bastard Keyboards Skeletyl (QMK)
- Boardsource Lulu RP2040 (QMK)
- Lily58 Rev1 (QMK)
- Corne/CRKBD Rev1 (QMK)
